author: FHead
body:
This is the backport to CMSSW 11_2_X of PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36489
More information can be found in the original PR.

It addresses issue https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/37841.

It passed basic matrix tests

@mandrenguyen
title: Bug fix to the HiPuRhoProducer.cc
